description:
# 1.0.0 (2026-02-01)


### Bug Fixes

* `backtick` is replaced with an empty string in bash ([#8](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/8)) ([b4da71b](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/b4da71b9bd773fd4ef940dc5c55fb6d3c19a8c95))
* `backtick` is replaced with an empty string in bash ([#9](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/9)) ([7f20f37](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/7f20f377a0a63046d615e664274b3fa9a74cf597))
* **AddResources:** Change resource system to per app, remove per patch resource system that is problematic with Crowdin ([#12](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/12)) ([2a652d5](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/2a652d521a4b429246ad0e3ca8cf45256266fc0a))
* Change recommended version to 20.37.48 ([898127a](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/898127a7a7d8fc9d07da75c66cf864afb12b6f11))
* Changing default enum setting type setting does not always always clear preference data ([101fe42](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/101fe423de30ac4936aa9c34df6b5165b291480e))
* Create pre-release build for testing ([b3a2318](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/b3a2318d38bf2c652c3f6ee22d872a8bb3aec3a8))
* **Custom branding:** Default to userâ€‘provided icon and name when provided ([eef8798](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/eef8798602ebf805eb3cff08e010025a0a8e93ab))
* **Custom branding:** Resolve background playback crash with custom branded root installation ([3039650](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/3039650460fdd2731b9ac1622127aa04a2b8a322))
* **Custom branding:** Resolve startup crash if custom branding is excluded in expert mode ([3f2d733](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/3f2d7338f587ef8a4ff8331621d6e68dd160d746))
* Fix publish? ([acfdef2](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/acfdef222c07fe09da47c36616ed1afd19d857f0))
* **GmsCore support:** Change recommended MicroG to MicroG-RE ([9337da4](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/9337da40205ba977679dc1a7fa94050d3b4b6fc9))
* **GmsCore support:** Remove vendor id patch option ([7dd0eec](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/7dd0eec316689212d491d38a22d556a59def0d8e))
* Move all classes to morphe namespace ([bcd61e7](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/bcd61e7f96dbe17b63548bf293c03f71d2aaab60))
* **Reddit:** Change recommended app target to `2026.03.0` ([7a5cda5](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/7a5cda571d4ec5e6324cc2905d0c8dec3b0c8f52))
* **Reddit:** Fix Recently Visited Shelf patch not being usable ([#316](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/316)) ([49bab2b](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/49bab2becde7f1adf593266b88abba0b876925ba))
* **Reddit:** Handle navigation bar buttons hidden behind feature flags ([#328](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/328)) ([2b8c337](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/2b8c33702293acfbd859cdfbdf1342e5f9e96bc2))
* Remove DSL from fingerprints ([#6](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/6)) ([bd385bf](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/bd385bf8bca2e8cc5efe8c124a14d320f80ef75d))
* Remove installation nag screen that prevent sharing with close friends, but also will never stop counterfeit sites ([c8dc331](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/c8dc33165d52152f3d531200bd79f052638adb35))
* Remove PAT from GitHub actions ([7fc9408](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/7fc9408e4383509e99d179b0194b8064942f181a))
* Remove restrictions on AGP due to the use of hardcoded registers in LithoFilterPatch ([#41](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/41)) ([223ed8f](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/223ed8f78561d8cb046d371baed9646b4e8138f3))
* Rename `bundleBundles` to `generatePatchesList` ([6a57b50](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/6a57b508bac801bebd5abf1136539147f1f24c86))
* Resolve ssl connection timeout in ci (test) ([9e94551](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/9e94551f78a87f4eb6f60aabcec98fe7874f2158))
* Restore code ([9b45623](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/9b45623c4596034a353bcfbe4e927ec012564d7e))
* Revert Android Studio automatic changes ([549e50c](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/549e50cc1ebc85ae9c2457cd7b1d2665832433b5))
* **Spoof video streams:** Change default client to VR 1.47.48 ([#116](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/116)) ([2bc5775](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/2bc577554f54fd2ecfcd682b83844511461effe4))
* **Spoof video streams:** Disable client flag that breaks playback with experimental app targets ([8cace8b](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/8cace8b442d32c07b2fcd4da3b596497608e626c))
* **Spoof video streams:** Restore missing file during commit conflict resolution ([b5e6fb3](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/b5e6fb330ea2ff4976836b410aadb97e6c9de559))
* Use 'notification' language instead of 'toast' ([82d1b9c](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/82d1b9cf9d85557482e4d08093944e8e7f1a68fb))
* Use more informative patch error if the same APK is patched twice ([52e8b1f](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/52e8b1f78522a1d5e23a7956cb3d52ad450d8c9c))
* **YouTube - Auto captions:** Cannot disable auto captions with 20.21 app target ([#145](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/145)) ([dc43944](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/dc43944adbcef5aa4754ca3d1fecd07a502277f3))
* **YouTube - Exit fullscreen mode:** Handle exiting fullscreen on the first video opened ([7aedf33](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/7aedf33f910da53f5edeada0ac28c27c6bf4d34b))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** `Hide video ads` does not hide Shorts ads ([#260](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/260)) ([9078d92](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/9078d92c444d1d6abe095a3a694a518e7fb078e9))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** Hide new type of ad ([7e6b1e4](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/7e6b1e400fd93c1080ab82a6b12844159ef3ad89))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** Hide new type of general ad, movie ad and web search result ([#92](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/92)) ([fe51d8c](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/fe51d8caa2de13136ea3c4775147b0b572f60bda))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** Hide new type of player ad ([#187](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/187)) ([4702043](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/4702043ea35fb3b1439ad30406b41179d019f2a1))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** Support `Hide fullscreen ads` on Android 13+ devices ([#17](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/17)) ([f147194](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/f147194f9c9a0dc552e0624a6db45d6d5e9714c3))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** YouTube Doodles are unclickable when Hide ads is turned on ([f533641](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/f533641d4a806d0a7066dc1042bcf4019f915354))
* **YouTube - Hide ads:** YouTube Doodles are unclickable when Hide ads is turned on ([8642921](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/8642921c2b3d6596d709aadc7aa89ed612746814))
* **YouTube - Hide end screen cards:** Resolve patching `20.31.42` ([3033432](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/3033432644fc986930f4eec51d4fc233f6389c23))
* **YouTube - Hide layout components:** Do not change system nav bar transparency when disabling status bar transparency ([4ad98fd](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/4ad98fddbadf77c0132287978ad59051498a149f))
* **YouTube - Hide layout components:** Fix "Hide ticket shelf" not working when "Hide horizontal shelves" is off ([#124](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/124)) ([84eeb0d](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/84eeb0d9f949657a7d468d9babfaca37d03b0d78))

* **YouTube - Loop video:** Fix looping button state ([#22](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/22)) ([46380b9](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/46380b9982a73a8236b88cba387cab3566e81687))
* **YouTube - Loop video:** Wrong icon applied ([#13](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/13)) ([57cb0fc](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/57cb0fcd320b2b6a75dc9aec1ea41d6bd3d6c6ae))

* **YouTube - Open Shorts in regular player:** Resolve back button sometimes closing the app instead of exiting fullscreen mode ([fba010b](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/fba010b8e99dcce3411824df296be5a61f4b87f0))
* **YouTube - Remove background playback restrictions:** Fix background playback not working with certain offline videos ([bb38f76](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/bb38f763f271d14b80166d517a3e840578d1f5b9))
* **YouTube - Remove viewer discretion dialog:** Not working on YouTube 20.14.43+ ([#19](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/19)) ([63dbb57](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/63dbb57f2b1e0cf14504c2f7e75d3c9c25be8df4))

* **YouTube - Spoof app version:** Change oldest spoof target to `19.35.36` ([#86](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/86)) ([4ff0959](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/4ff09591a89a3203aa3a1f27580126783ee9edf5))

* **YouTube:** Show a more descriptive error message if attempting to patch a region specific APKM that does not contain languages for all regions ([0f2700d](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/0f2700db110a2e8d041e1213e0d95ed50f6d54ac))

### Features

* Add dark icon ([#16](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/16)) ([9f1448e](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/9f1448e9e63cc8035bb43ea2233233f249356c4e))

* Add new About dialog style ([#21](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/21)) ([bb96947](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/bb96947011ffad36a7cd81c8e8d97927228a1f51))

* Generate new release ([f7f9a61](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/f7f9a61698ba74dfea4927157ac6951b5bc717a0))
* Perform full search of free registers ([2980f64](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/2980f64c9ee58f19d21db3f14e2120d2ce1deb85))
* **Reddit:** Add ability to hide Games button on nav bar ([#315](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/315)) ([07b9fc2](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/07b9fc250b24c0219e8f650883f3c22ea7dfa23f))
* **Reddit:** Add support for Reddit `2026.04.0` ([#276](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/276)) ([0203cf6](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/0203cf62d7214fe79b42a804fc51111e805f2afd))
* Skip publishing to GitHub packages ([#275](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/issues/275)) ([71b7db4](https://github.com/bdgerszewski/morphe-patches/commit/71b7db4d38ac44ce6d0b9de111599485e1de015a))
